form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Sheehy introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation

form.official-title: To authorize additional appropriations to Amtrak for long-distance routes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Rail Service Continuity and Stability Act of 2025.

section.header: Additional appropriations to Amtrak for long-distance routes
section.text: There are authorized to be appropriated to Amtrak such additional sums as may be necessary to support service for long-distance routes (as that term is defined in section 24102 of title 49, United States Code) existing on the date of the enactment of this Act.
